SENTENCE.STRING: ([Arabic: بغداد] [Arabic transliteration: Badād]) is the capital of Iraq and of Baghdad Governorate.
is the second-largest city in Southwest Asia after Tehran and the second-largest city in the Arab world after Cairo, and the largest city in Iraq, with a population estimated at around 7 million.
Situated on the Tigris River at 33°20'N,44°26'E,
was once the centre of Dar al-Islam, Muslim civilisation.
